patterns_discovered: GitHub Actions workflow structure with multiple job stages
Deployment workflows with separate lint, test, build, and deploy jobs
Leveraging GitHub secrets for secure credential management
Conditional job execution based on branch and event type
gotchas_discovered: Need to manage multiple environment-specific secrets
Handling different deployment scenarios (preview vs production)
Ensuring consistent Node.js and pnpm versions across workflows
Managing path-based triggers for workflow execution
Implementing cache strategies for faster builds

approach_outcome.description: Added comprehensive GitHub Actions workflow setup tasks following existing snake.yml pattern
key_achievements: Created detailed GitHub Actions architecture diagram
Defined workflow patterns and best practices
Developed portfolio and store deployment workflows

recommendations: Implement Cloudflare Zone ID secret for cache purging
Consider adding more comprehensive testing strategies
Regularly audit and rotate deployment secrets
Create documentation explaining the GitHub Actions workflow setup
